name: Barong Tagalog
description: The Barong Tagalog is the national dress of the Philippines. It is an embroidered long-sleeved shirt made of lightweight material.

name: Baguio Strawberry Jam
description: A sweet and delicious jam made from fresh strawberries grown in Baguio, Philippines.

name: Handwoven Basket
description: A beautifully handwoven basket made by local artisans in the Philippines. Perfect for storage or decoration.

name: Dried Mangoes
description: A popular Filipino snack made from sweet and juicy Philippine mangoes.

name: Capiz Shell Decor
description: A decorative item made from capiz shells, a type of oyster found in Philippine waters.

name: Luzon Coffee Beans
description: High quality coffee beans sourced from the Luzon region of the Philippines. Enjoy a rich and aromatic cup.

name: Mother of Pearl Jewelry Box
description: An elegant jewelry box inlaid with mother of pearl, handcrafted by skilled Filipino artisans.

name: Yakan Cloth
description: A vibrant and intricately woven cloth from the Yakan tribe of Mindanao, Philippines.
